messages.subject: Re: An article I wrote
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/28/2002 12:32:47 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Oh, go for it! When I finish the damned book maybe they ll buy it ;) Kathryn [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/28/2002 12:32:47 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> > If you're interested, please check it out. Here's the URL:
> > http://www.uua.org/re/faithworks/fall02/leadership/leadershipc.html
>
> Kathryn, that was great! You wrote out all the ideas I've had swirling
> around in my head about RE that I haven't had time to express. Do you mind
> if I forward it to our RE committee? They aren't quite as progressive as
> yours -- well except for me ;-) -- but they seem to be on the brink of
> seeing this themselves -- even if they do send their kids to school ;-)
>
>
Oh, go for it!
When I finish the damned book maybe they'll buy it ;)
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
